title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the 'Open' and 'Close' project options in the Navigator are inconsistently enabled or disabled.
EB: Either both 'Open' and 'Close' project options should be available when both P1 and P2 are selected, or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Navigator in the software.
2. Select both 'P1' and 'P2' projects.
